rule.name: MMS_createMeetingSummaryForm
rule.description: SAIL form to schedule a new meeting in MMS
rule.definition: =#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout"( label: "Create a Meeting", instructions: "Please complete the information below to schedule a new meeting.", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "Meeting Details", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Subject", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: ri!meeting.subject, saveInto: ri!meeting.subject, required: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: "Description", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: ri!meeting.description, saveInto: ri!meeting.description, required: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pickerFieldUsers"( label: "Attendees", labelPosition: "ABOVE", groupFilter: #"_a-0000dac9-871e-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_37731", value: ri!attendeeUsernames, saveInto: ri!attendeeUsernames, required: true ) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "Start Time", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: ri!meeting.startDateTime, saveInto: ri!meeting.startDateTime, required: true, validations: if(ri!meeting.startDateTime<now(),"The meeting may not be scheduled in the past",null) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"( label: "Duration (minutes)", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: ri!meeting.durationMinutes, saveInto: ri!meeting.durationMinutes, required: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Location", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: ri!meeting.location, saveInto: ri!meeting.location, required: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Would you like to send reminders?", labelPosition: "ABOVE", choiceLabels: {"Yes", "No"}, choiceValues: {true(), false()}, value: ri!meeting.sendReminders, saveInto: ri!meeting.sendReminders, required: true ) } ) }, buttons: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonLayout"( primaryButtons: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidgetSubmit"( label: "Submit", style: "PRIMARY" ) }, secondaryButtons: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidgetSubmit"( label: "Cancel", style: "NORMAL", value: true, saveInto: ri!cancel, skipValidation: true ) } ) )
